heroSection.description: The Axians Institute is an open space dedicated to sharing skills so as to keep you at the highest level. It is also focused on innovation to enable talents to experiment with the new technologies of tomorrow's businesses. Axians Institute delivers general knowledge accompanied by local specificities.
heroSection.goalsDescription: Axians adopts a practical and concrete approach to transfer knowledge in line with VINCI Energies' values. Training centers, e-learning platforms and learning expeditions... everything is done to ensure that you deepen your expertise and grow as you progress throughout your career at Axians.â€‹
